item.title: Istio 1.6 实战：Sidecar 注入
item.description: values.sidecarInjectorWebhook.objectSelector values: sidecarInjectorWebhook: objectSelector: enabled: true autoInject: false https://kubernetes.io/zh/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/extensible-admission-controllers/ https://istio.io/latest/docs/ops/common-problems/injection/ charts中有说明，这是k8s v1.15后支持的特性 # Enable objectSelector to filter out pods with no need for sidecar before calling istio-sidecar-injector. # It is disabled by default since this function will only work after k8s v1.15. $ kubectl create namespace rd-2 $ kubectl label namespace rd-2 istio-injection=enabled $ kubectl apply -f jiediankeji/samples/httpbin/httpbin.yaml -n rd-2 此时不会注入 添加label template: metadata: labels: app: {{ include “k8swan.name” .
